text: a person saying "saying above all make haste your recital could not be more minute exclaimed lecoq approvingly now how about these two women"

original_data.title: librispeech_asr
original_data.description: LibriSpeech is a corpus of approximately 1000 hours of 16kHz read English speech, prepared by Vassil Panayotov with the assistance of Daniel Povey.
original_data.text: SAYING ABOVE ALL MAKE HASTE YOUR RECITAL COULD NOT BE MORE MINUTE EXCLAIMED LECOQ APPROVINGLY NOW HOW ABOUT THESE TWO WOMEN
